author: Hal Wigley
comment: I Loved this Watch face on my Zen 01, I upgraded to the Zen 02 now it is not compatible. So I give you 1 star. I want to buy the Watch Face W04  but I don't know it is compatible with Zen 02 watch. I like the looks of the square Watch Face.

author: Narayana Swamy
comment: After moto 360 upgrade to A.Were to 2.0 now it says not compatible. Can you check

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content:
For Wear 2.0 Watches: Open Play Store on your watch. Scroll down to "Apps on your Phone". Install the watch app from there. Please let us know or email for further assistance forzaonestudios@gmail.com
*App needs to be installed on phone then installed on your watch

comment: This app didn't work with my Michael Kors watch. I resynced it and nothing, not showing up in my watch faces on the android wear.

comment: I wish you had other option other than the black and white fun screen.

comment: No funciona con fondo negro, ya que se pierde el contorno.

Thanks!

author: Saravanan. G.M
comment: Nice one, would have been great if the analog clock can be set to a different time zone

author: Gregory Gresham
comment: Great watch face just wish you could pick the watch face screen color instead of it changing when you tap the face

author: Nertz
comment: I really like this watch face. What I was looking for. Well worth the price

author: A Razz
comment: Refund plz

author: Jason daily
comment: Pretty nice face !

author: Paul AltX
comment: Good looking, recommended

author: Chad Payne
comment: I do like the face a lot. I am not a fan of the tap to change color thing though. And the second hand rolling thing is neat but seems unnecessary since there is also a second hand. The map would probably be cooler of I traveled, but it's a nice touch. I think the screen looks a little unimpressive when in sleep /always on mode. I would turn it off on this face.
title: Looks really nice

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Email us for a refund at forzaonestudios@gmail.com

title: Will not sync with S2 Classic

title: It's great but...

author: Steven Andresen
comment: Keeps displaying inaccurate phone battery info. Already contacted developer and followed instructions which work for a while but reverts to wrong battery percentage being displayed.
title: Inaccurate Info Displayed

author: Kim Welling
comment: Looks great!  I like having digital & analog on the face plus the batteries. Sometimes my my picks up the analog time quicker but I grew up with that. But my grandson knows digital so it's great to have both on the same face. Works good at teaching both times!!!!  Thanks!!

author: Morgan Yarrington
comment: I like this watch face however, I think there should be more interactivity then just pressing the screen to change the colour. For example press on the analogue clock and bring up a stop watch. I would also like to be able to change each section of the watch face to different colours. Overall is a good watch face with the time easy to see but needs some work.
title: Good but needs some work

author: Porky Hontas
comment: Good-looking watch face. I only wish one or two more features could be added, such as, increasing the time the watch face stays on and maybe adding an ambient mode.
title: Nice!

author: Donald Lewis
comment: I love the map on here and the fact that I can change the colors to whatever I want is really tops in my book! A really HD watch face that incorporates perfectly into my moto 360-2. Its so crisp and easy to read. It has a nice amount of info without being too overwhelming. Easy to find everything. I only wish it would allow the step counter and some other health sensory info.
title: Unique and customizable!

author: T Redhead
comment: Beautiful watch face marred by a phone battery level reading incorrectly  :(

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content: Hi T.  We can help you out.  Please email us at forzaonestudios@gmail.com   Thanks!

title: Phone battery level incorrect!

author: Robert Julite
comment: Easy to use watch app & very customizable as far as colors. Looks nice even when in power saving mode. Doesn't make my watch look "cheap".
title: Beautiful

author: Mina Wassef
comment: Plus it keep getting back to the Orange theme  if I changed colors. Fix please

reply.author: Forza One Studios
reply.content:
You can disable the animation in settings. This will drain the battery less.
There are 3 color settings that you can cycle through. You can set each of these to a different color. Also you can disable the tap to change color - "Interactivity" in settings. Otherwise email us forzaonestudios@gmail.com - thanks.

title: Battery drainer

comment: I like the watch face, but unfortunately it does not accurately track the battery life on Galaxy S7.

author: bryantut1609
comment: Installed without issue and looks great and fixes watch as pictured.  I seen on some reviews that it eats up battery life and will monitor.  I wear the watch about 10 hours per day and when Iget home it's between 65 - 70% battery life left.  I'll update this review if that battery life changes.  If this post isn't updated that mean it's working great and not using anymore battery life then any other watch face that I have.  Boy it looks GREAT!!

title: On Moto 360 G2
